component.heading: Buy stocks
component.description: Invest in equities to give your portfolio an edge

item.heading: Stocks
item.description: Invest in shares of listed companies to create a diversified investment portfolio

item.heading: Stock baskets
item.description: Invest in a specially curated baskets or create your own themed basket

item.heading: Exchange traded funds
item.description: Invest in an ETF - a basket of securities that is listed and traded on the stock exchange

item.heading: Listed Bonds
item.description: Invest in fixed income securities like government bonds, tax-free bonds and sovereign gold bonds
